name: The Ninja And The Mirror World
name_original: The Ninja And The Mirror World
description: You Play As A Shinobi Who Has The Power To Harness Essence From His Mirrored World  And Summon A Portal There.  Being The Only Known Human Able To  Summon The Mirror To The Other World You Are Given Tasks Most People Can't Complete, Like Me Trying To Complete This Game In Time For The Game Jam...
